alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Lincoln and southwestern Custer Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Callaway to 9 miles south of Brady. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Brady, Oconto, Buckeye, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Etna, Pressey State Wildlife Management Area, Milldale, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Lodi, Vroman and Finchville. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 193 and 208. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
